mapper.insert: insert into club_member(cm_me_num, cm_cl_num, cm_authority) values(#{me_num},#{cl_num},#{authority})
mapper.select: select * from club_member where cm_me_num = #{me_num} and cm_cl_num = #{cl_num}

select club_member.*, me_nickname, me_rating, me_tr_name, ifnull(en_num, 0) as en_num, if(ifnull(T1.t1, 0) + ifnull(T2.t2, 0) + ifnull(T3.t3, 0) = 0, true, false) as entry_able from club_member join member on cm_me_num = me_num join club_team on cm_cl_num = ct_cl_num join team on ct_te_num = te_num join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num left join entry on en_te_num = te_num and en_me_num = cm_me_num left join (select mt_ti_num as t1, en_me_num as e1 from entry join team on en_te_num = te_num join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num where mt_date = mt_date) as T1 on T1.t1 = mt_ti_num and T1.e1 = cm_me_num left join (select mt_ti_num + 1 as t2, en_me_num as e2 from entry join team on en_te_num = te_num join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num where mt_date = mt_date) as T2 on T2.t2 = mt_ti_num and T2.e2 = cm_me_num left join (select mt_ti_num - 1 as t3, en_me_num as e3 from entry join team on en_te_num = te_num join `match` on te_mt_num = mt_num where mt_date = mt_date) as T3 on T3.t3 = mt_ti_num and T3.e3 = cm_me_num where cm_cl_num = #{cl_num} and (cm_authority = "LEADER" or cm_authority = "MEMBER") and mt_num = #{mt_num} order by me_rating desc;
select club_member.* from club join club_member on cm_cl_num = cl_num where cl_num = #{cl_num} and cm_authority = 'LEADER'
